summary: This is an email chain from October 26, 2021, between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) in the Southern District of New York and an unidentified recipient, discussing the finalization and sending of a letter, likely related to the Epstein case. The email includes an attachment of a draft letter with edits.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial email in the chain, working in the Southern District of New York, coordinating the finalization and sending of a letter.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding case letter

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 26, 2021, involving an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY.
The subject is the finalization and sending of a letter, with an attached draft document titled '2021-10-26_GM Jetter_re_preliminary_remarks_Final.docx'.
The email addresses of the sender and recipient are partially redacted in the provided text.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal or procedural activity related to the Epstein case in late 2021.
The attachment suggests the letter may be addressed to or reference an individual or entity named 'GM Jetter'.
